Dumb Charades

Unleash your acting skills, decode hilarious gestures, and guess like never before in this lively game of Dumb Charades!

About the Event

  • Participants act out movie titles without speaking. This game is all about teamwork, creativity, quick thinking, and creating unforgettable moments.

Round 1: Warm-Up Round

  • Each team has 60 seconds to guess the titles.
  • Evaluation would be done based on a maximum number of guesses.

Round 2: Challenge Round

  • Each team has 60 seconds to guess the title.
  • If the team fails to guess within the time limit, the team will be awarded zero points.
  • If the team guesses correctly within the first 30 seconds, they earn 5 bonus points.

Round 3: Final Round

  • Each team has 180 seconds to guess the title.
  • If teams guess correctly within 20 seconds, they will receive 10 bonus points.

Rules

  • Each team must have 2 members.
  • No speaking, mouthing words, or writing. Only gestures are allowed.
  • Players cannot spell out words or mimic lip movements to convey letters or syllables.
  • Only one person can act per turn; team members should rotate turns.
  • Only the acting teamâ€™s members can guess the title. No help or hints from the audience or other teams.

Judging Criteria

  • Each correct answer within the time limit awards points (e.g., 10 points per correct guess).
  • Additional points will be given if the team guesses correctly within time.
  • Points can be awarded to zero for rule violations, like speaking or breaking silent acting rules.
